ygData.subject: Re: Freeport Militia Quest
ygData.msgSnippet: I have heard you have to be in the 30 s before you attempt this but not sure - did see the two militia guards out in the west commonlands get killed by two
ygData.messageBody:
I have heard you have to be in the 30's before you attempt this but not
sure - did see the two militia guards out in the west commonlands get killed
by two player's once - was an amazing sight -

Also I am a 5/almost 6th lvl paladin in the Fennin Ro server trying to get
the desert Tarantula venom sac but still too tough for me by myself - anyone
who could help me hunt would be most appreciated

Keep the Faith

Tavaran

> -----Original Message-----
> From: John Lyons [mailto:jjl1@...]
> Sent: Monday, April 19, 1999 9:32 AM
> To: eqpaladin@onelist.com
> Subject: [eqpaladin] Freeport Militia Quest
>
>
> From: John Lyons <jjl1@...>
>
> Greetings fellow Paladins,
>
> My name is Valandil, a level 19 paladin hailing from the Karana server.
> I am talking about the Freeport Hall of Truth quest where you have to go
> kill militia guards and return their helms. I was wondering when a
> player would be able to do this, since they all con red to me and
> haven't seen anyone else try. Farewell noble warriors.
>
> Valandil
> Holy Knight of the Hall of Truth
>
>
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
> Have you visited the new ONElist home page lately?
